title: Onmyoji - Novel Updates
author: Yumemakura Baku
description: Onmyoji tells of the exploits of famed onmyōji Abe no Seimei, who meets and befriends bungling court noble, Minamoto no Hiromasa. Together they protect the capital of Heian-kyō against an opposing onmyōji, Dōson, who is secretly plotting the downfall of the emperor. [taken from wikipedia]>
